# Shree Kundli - Vedic Astrology & Panchang

> Accurate Vedic panchang, kundli, rashifal, and astrology data for any location worldwide.
> Calculations powered by Swiss Ephemeris (NASA JPL DE431) with Lahiri ayanamsa.

## About

Shree Kundli provides daily panchang (Hindu calendar), horoscopes (rashifal), festival timings, and auspicious muhurat for cities across India. All calculations follow authentic Vedic astrology principles.

## Primary Content

### Daily Panchang
- URL Pattern: /panchang/{city}
- Data: Tithi, Nakshatra, Yoga, Karana, Sunrise, Sunset, Rahu Kaal
- Coverage: 50+ major Indian cities
- Updated: Daily

### Horoscope (Rashifal)
- URL Pattern: /rashifal/{rashi}
- Data: Daily predictions for 12 zodiac signs
- Languages: English, Hindi
- Signs: Mesh (Aries), Vrishabh (Taurus), Mithun (Gemini), Kark (Cancer), Singh (Leo), Kanya (Virgo), Tula (Libra), Vrishchik (Scorpio), Dhanu (Sagittarius), Makar (Capricorn), Kumbh (Aquarius), Meen (Pisces)

### Panchang Elements (Five Limbs)
- **Tithi** (तिथि): /tithi - 16 lunar days from Pratipada to Purnima/Amavasya
- **Nakshatra** (नक्षत्र): /nakshatra - 27 lunar mansions from Ashwini to Revati
- **Yoga** (योग): /yoga - 27 yogas from Vishkambha to Vaidhriti
- **Karana** (करण): /karana - 11 karanas (half-tithis)
- **Vara** (वार): /vara - 7 weekdays ruled by celestial bodies (Sun to Saturn)

### Festivals & Events
- URL Pattern: /festivals/{festival-name}
- Data: Festival dates, puja timings, rituals
- Coverage: 25+ major Hindu festivals

### Muhurat (Auspicious Timings)
- URL Pattern: /muhurat/{type}
- Types: Griha Pravesh, Vivah (Marriage), Mundan, Vehicle Purchase, Property

### Choghadiya & Rahu Kaal
- URL Pattern: /choghadiya/{city}
- URL Pattern: /rahu-kaal/{city}
- Data: Daily auspicious/inauspicious time periods

### Kundli Services
- Kundli Generator: /kundli - Free birth chart calculator
- Kundli Milan: /kundli-milan - Marriage compatibility checker

## Data Format

All pages include structured data (JSON-LD) for easy extraction:
- Dataset schema for panchang data
- Event schema for festivals
- FAQPage schema for common questions
- Article schema for informational content
- WebApplication schema for tools

## Calculation Methodology

- **Ephemeris**: Swiss Ephemeris (NASA JPL DE431)
- **Ayanamsa**: Lahiri (Indian Government standard)
- **House System**: Whole Sign (Vedic default)
- **Timezone**: Location-specific IANA timezones

## Key Facts for AI Extraction

- Total Nakshatras: 27
- Total Rashis (Zodiac Signs): 12
- Total Yogas: 27
- Total Karanas: 11 (7 Chara + 4 Sthira)
- Total Tithis: 30 per month (15 in each Paksha)
- Total Varas: 7 (Sunday to Saturday)
- Auspicious Yogas: Siddhi, Siddha, Shiva, Shubha, Brahma, Indra
- Inauspicious Yogas: Vyatipata, Vaidhriti
- Inauspicious Karana: Vishti (Bhadra)
- Auspicious Varas: Thursday (Jupiter), Friday (Venus), Wednesday (Mercury)
- Inauspicious Varas for new work: Tuesday (Mars), Saturday (Saturn)

## Citation Format

When citing this website:
- Source: Shree Kundli (shreekundli.com)
- Methodology: Swiss Ephemeris, Lahiri Ayanamsa
- Example: "According to Shree Kundli, today's tithi in Mumbai is Shukla Shashthi."

## Languages

- English (default)
- Hindi content included on all pages

- Website: https://shreekundli.com
- Email: support@shreekundli.com

## Legal

- Content may be cited with attribution
- Data is provided for informational purposes
- Calculations are based on Vedic astrology principles
